master.name: master
master.description: Main development branch for BenPharm Online

metadata.description: Comprehensive pharmacy management SaaS platform for Nigerian pharmacies

tasks.title: Database Schema Implementation
tasks.description: Extend existing Prisma schema with pharmacy-specific models for products, orders, customers, and payments
tasks.details: Create Product model with Nigerian medicine details (NAFDAC registration, wholesale/retail pricing), Order model with Nigerian address fields (State, LGA), Customer model with business verification, and Payment tracking models. Files to modify: packages/database/prisma/schema.prisma

tasks.title: Product Catalog System
tasks.description: Build comprehensive product management system with search, filtering, and inventory tracking
tasks.details: Create API endpoints for product management, frontend components for product catalog, search functionality, and admin interface. Budget includes development time for API routes, React components, and product management features.

tasks.title: Enhanced User Registration & Authentication
tasks.description: Extend authentication system for retail and wholesale customers with business verification
tasks.details: Add customer type selection, business registration fields, Nigerian address fields (State, LGA), phone verification via SMS, and role-based access control. Modify existing auth components and create new business signup forms.

tasks.title: Shopping Cart & Checkout System
tasks.description: Implement complete shopping cart functionality with wholesale/retail pricing and Nigerian delivery options
tasks.details: Create cart state management with Jotai, quantity validation, different pricing tiers, bulk discounts, and delivery options (Standard ₦500, Express ₦1000, Pickup Free). Include cart persistence and checkout flow.

tasks.title: Order Management System
tasks.description: Complete order processing workflow with Nigerian-specific features and status tracking
tasks.details: Implement order creation, status workflow (Received → Processing → Ready → Dispatched → Delivered), order history, and admin management interface. Include Nigerian delivery integration and customer communication.

tasks.title: Admin Dashboard Foundation
tasks.description: Build comprehensive admin interface for order, inventory, and customer management
tasks.details: Create admin dashboard with key metrics, order management interface, basic inventory tracking, customer management panel, and daily/weekly/monthly statistics display.

tasks.title: Payment Gateway Integration - Flutterwave Primary
tasks.description: Integrate Flutterwave as primary payment gateway with OPay and Paystack as fallback options
tasks.details: Implement Flutterwave SDK (1.4% + ₦50 fees), OPay SDK (1.5% fees), Paystack SDK (1.5% + ₦100 fees), payment selection UI, webhook handlers, retry logic, and fallback system for Nigerian market.

tasks.title: WhatsApp & SMS Notification System
tasks.description: Implement automated customer communication via WhatsApp Business API and SMS gateway
tasks.details: Integrate WhatsApp Business API and Nigerian SMS gateway (Termii), create notification templates for order confirmations, payment updates, delivery alerts, and admin notifications.

tasks.title: Inventory Management System
tasks.description: Real-time stock tracking with low stock alerts and expiry date management for medicines
tasks.details: Implement inventory tracking, low stock alerts, bulk product updates, expiry date tracking for medicines, stock movement logging, and reorder point calculations.

tasks.title: Environment Configuration & Setup
tasks.description: Configure development environment with all required services and API keys
tasks.details: Set up local development environment, database connections, payment gateway credentials, SMS and WhatsApp API keys, file storage configuration, and email settings for Nigerian market.
